page.title: 10Birdham Businesses
page.content: The Birdham Village Stores is situated on the main A286 and has its own car park. The Store has the following main departments: Groceries Vegetables and Fruit Bread Delicatessen Sweets, Tobaccos and Papers Hardware Wines and Spirits Frozen Foods and Butchers. The Post Office has its premises within the Store. In a separate building but under the same management is the Pallant Cash and Carry Wine Store selling bulk quantities of Wine. Near Birdham Pool is the Lock Stores, a general store with facilities for light refreshments. Birdham Garage, also on the A286, has car sales, mechanichal servicing and a petrol filling station.
